member.name: IDataTransferManagerInterop.GetForWindow
member.summary: Gets the DataTransferManager instance for the specified window.
member.param: The window whose DataTransferManager instance is to be retrieved.
The requested interface ID of the DataTransferManager instance.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IDataTransferManagerInterop.ShowShareUIForWindow
member.summary: Displays the UI for sharing content for the specified window.
member.param: The window to show the share UI for.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IDataTransferManagerInterop
member.summary: Enables access to DataTransferManager methods in a Windows Store app that manages multiple windows.
